text: Joachim Mdadu Kikhela Kupika (10 March 1932https://acpcongo.com/kongo-central- les-fideles-du-diocese-de-boma-informes-du-deces-de-mgr-mbadu-kikhela-kupika/ - 12 March 2019) was a Democratic Republic of the Congo Roman Catholic bishop. == Early life == Mdadu Kikhela Kupika was born in the Democratic Republic of the Congo and was ordained to the priesthood in 1959. He served as coadjutor and diocesan bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Boma, Democratic Republican of the Congo from 1975 to 2001.Diocese of Boma ==Notes== Category:1932 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo Roman Catholic bishops
title: Joachim Mbadu Kikhela Kupika
